featured.text: Typhoon Maggie brought to I-lan County a huge amount of rainfall, much greater than the _____ rainfall of the season in the area.

definition.zh_def: 一種顏色，通常指藍色和綠色之間的色調。
definition.en_def: A color that is typically a shade between blue and green.
definition.example: The sky turned a beautiful shade of lan at sunset.
